articles.author: Tripti Lahiri
articles.title: Popcorn Is Taxed at Three Rates in India. A Nation Says This Is Why We’re a Mess. - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Critics say government’s efforts to simplify system and cut red tape are going in reverse; ‘popcorn is popcorn’
articles.content:
A seemingly routine ruling by Indias top tax officials went off like metal in a microwave. 
The government laid out a three-tiered system for taxing popcorn depending on if it is packaged or sold lo… [+268 chars]
